text: Military academies are military schools for the training of army officers. In the US there are several academies: *United States Military Academy (West Point, New York) *United States Naval Academy (Annapolis, Maryland) *United States Air Force Academy (Colorado Springs, Colorado) *United States Coast Guard Academy (New London, Connecticut) *United States Merchant Marine Academy (Kings Point, New York) Category:Schools in the United States Category:Military of the United States
title: United States service academies
